title: Nintendo Direct Tomorrow! Predictions & Expectations - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.27.22
description:
Go to http://athleticgreens.com/kindafunny to get a free 1-year supply of Vitamin D and 5 free travels packs with your first purchase.

Blessing and Tim break down their expectations for tomorrow's Nintendo Direct Mini: Partner Showcase, Metroid Prime coming to Switch, and Kojima almost working on a project similar to The Boys.

00:17:35 - Jeff Grubb says Metroid Prime is coming to Switch

00:38:15 - Ads
00:39:29 - Kojima shelved a project because it was too similar to The Boys
00:46:25 -  A report claims ‘Cyberpunk 2077’ bugs weren’t caught because a QA company lied to CD Projekt Red
00:51:13 - PlayStation Plus Free Games For July 2022 Leaked
00:55:02 - Steam Decks are increasing in production
00:56:25 - New Tencent game looks cool
00:58:37 - Out Today & You're Wrong
